name: The Flame in the Flood

files.goginstaller: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Windows installer

game.exe: drive_c/GOG Games/The Flame in the Flood/RiverGame.exe

content:
files:
- goginstaller: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Windows installer
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/The Flame in the Flood/RiverGame.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win64
    args: /LANG=English /SP- /SUPPRESSMSGBOXES
    executable: goginstaller
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
